* Ajay Patil


Ajay Patil
==========

![AjayPatil_web](https://www.edisonnj.org/Pics/AjayPatil_web.jpg?t=202409111411070 "AjayPatil_web")
*Term expires Dec. 31, 2023*

* Edison Township Council Vice President -2019
* Edison Township Council President -2018
* Edison Finance Committee; member
* Edison Board of Education Committee; member
* Cablevision Advisory Committee; member
* Veterans Affairs Committee; member
* Municipal Alliance and Ethics Commission; member
* Economic Redevelopment Committee; member
* Various Youth Cricket League: member
* Project Management Institute, N.J. Chapter; member
* South Asian-American organizations; member

Email: Ajay Patil:
[apatil@edisonnj.gov](mailto:apatil@edisonnj.gov)


![footer shape](https://www.edisonnj.org/_assets_/images/footer-shape-top.png)
![footer shape](https://www.edisonnj.org/_assets_/images/footer-shape-bot.png)

T:732-287-0900
